content.rendered:
Directed by David Dhawan

Written by Farhad Samji

Cast Varun Dhawan (Raju Coolie / Kunwar Raj Pratap Singh). Sara Ali Khan (Sarah Rozario). Paresh Rawal (Jeffrey Rozario). Jaaved Jaaferi (Pandit Jai Kishen / Jackson (as Javed Jaffrey)). Rajpal Naurang Yadav (Pinto (as Rajpal Yadav)). Johny Lever (Inspector Godbole (as Johnny Lever)). Bharti Achrekar (Jeffrey’s Mother). Anil Dhawan (Mahindra Pratap Singh). Sahil Vaid (Deepak). Shikha Talsania (Anju Rosario). Manoj Joshi (Manager). Shashi Kiran (Coolie Chacha). Vikas Verma (Mahesh Anand). Rajat Rawail (Waiter (at the Resort)). Ashrut Jain (Richard groom). Jiten Mukhi (Dsouza). Natasha Rastogi (Mrs. Dsouza). Jyoti Gauba (Rohan’s Mother). Rajkumar Kanojia (Hawaldar Dhople). Naushaad Abbas (Goon outside temple). Vivan Shah (Rohan).Gopuu Ali. Rakesh Bedi (Shalini’s Father). Shibesh Debnath (Coolie). Lakhmirsingh (Ramu).Chandramogli Madem. Hemant Pandey (Anna).Sahil Patel. Deependra Singh (Pawan). Gajendra Kumar Suthar (Coolie). Nagendra Pratap Singh Verma (Photographer (credit only))

Languages Hindi

Producers Jackky Bhagnani. Vashu Bhagnani. Sahni Bob. Deepshika Deshmukh. Harish Iyer. Mudit Jain. Yogiraj Shetty

Production Pooja Entertainment & Film. Puja Film
